name: Blessed Fate
description:
**NOTE: E to equip and hit buttons, the prompt isn't showing up for some reason, apologies!**

**SECOND NOTE: If it runs slow in browser, you might try downloading the .zip and playing it from that

A 3D game with 8x8 textures!

Controls are in the top-left!

Your species is trying to take the overworld, but they need the secret weapon technology to move forward with the plan.

Music by carlogasparini
